title: Pop-up locations around South Louisville helping people survive severe winter weather | Wdrb-video | wdrb.com
text: [] Pop-up locations around South Louisville helping people survive severe winter weather - - Updated [Comments](/news/wdrb-video/pop-up-locations-around-south-louisville-helping-people-survive-severe-winter-weather/video_b380a981-5a25-5233-be62-18b8c851bfbd.html#comments) Some churches and nonprofits in south Louisville have opened pop-up white flag shelters as severe winter weather hits the area.
